name: Einherjar (itch)
description:
"The Gods are dead, and the End comes again. Who shall save you now?"

For millennia, a secret war of souls rages between the forces of good and evil.
Slowly but surely, evil is winning the battle for the fate of all humanity, while good searches frantically for an elusive key to a cryptic Prophecy that may be mankind’s final hope.

Follow the journey of a high school girl as she joins the secret war and enters a new reality of legendary heroes, lost souls, and ancient evil.

*****

This is an entry for the IGMC 2017 contest.

All resources in this game, INCLUDING songs with lyrics,  are LEGAL and LICENSED.

This game would not have been possible without the incredible effort of everyone on the team. Great job guys! We did it!
